title: The Mikaelson Family
description: How well do you know the Original family?

questions.question: How many Mikaelson siblings are there in total?
questions.explanation: There are 7 siblings: Freya, Finn, Elijah, Niklaus, Kol, Rebekah, and Henrik (who died before becoming a vampire).

questions.question: Who is Klaus's biological father?
questions.explanation: Ansel was a werewolf and Klaus's biological father. Esther's affair with him is why Klaus has the werewolf gene.

questions.question: Elijah is known as the most noble and honorable of the Mikaelson siblings.
questions.explanation: Elijah is known for his honor, suits, and moral code, earning him the reputation as the noble Mikaelson.

questions.question: What happened to the eldest Mikaelson, Freya?

options.text: She was taken by their aunt Dahlia

questions.explanation: Freya was taken by Dahlia as payment for the fertility spell that allowed Esther to have children.

questions.question: Who created the Original vampires?
questions.explanation: Esther, the Original Witch, created the spell that turned her children into the first vampires.

questions.question: What is Rebekah's greatest wish throughout the series?

options.text: To be human and have a family

questions.explanation: Rebekah has always longed to be human, fall in love, and have children of her own.

questions.question: Kol was known for being the wildest and most unpredictable Mikaelson.
questions.explanation: Kol was notorious for his reckless behavior, love of chaos, and inability to control his bloodlust.

questions.question: Why did Mikael hunt his own children?

options.text: He hated vampires and especially Klaus

questions.explanation: Mikael despised what his children became and especially hated Klaus for not being his biological son.
